hicpp-braces-around-statements.description:
Description

The
hicpp-braces-around-statements
check is an alias, please see
readability-braces-around-statements
for more information.
It enforces the
rule 6.1.1
.
hicpp-braces-around-statements.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
